==About WorkRave 1.10==
Workrave is a program that assists in the recovery and prevention of Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI). The program frequently alerts you to take micro-pauses, rest breaks and restricts you to your daily limit. The program runs on GNU/Linux and Microsoft Windows. {{images/Workrave.gif}} 
==Features==
- Is a cross-platform program
- The software periodically locks the screen while an animated character walks the user through various stretch exercises
- It is dependent on GTK+ graphical widget toolkit, and is also available for Microsoft Windows
